name: Drone Resolution
description:
Controls:

  • Move with the arrow keys
  • Shoot with the space bar

You are a slime in a wild area, and all wants to kill you. The things you see are recorded with a drone, that is pursuing you. Throw rocks to it to make the resolution of the camera bigger and make the drone to be out of range of capture, and survive!

Join my discord server:
